sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnschdulinfo ( SCHDUL_ID , schdul_se , schdul_dept_id , schdul_knd_code , schdul_bgnde , schdul_endde , schdul_nm , schdul_cn , schdul_place , schdul_ipcr_code , schdul_charger_id , atch_file_id , frst_regist_pnttm , frst_register_id , last_updt_pnttm , last_updusr_id , reptit_se_code ) VALUES ( #schdulId# , #schdulSe# , #schdulDeptId# , #schdulKndCode# , #schdulBgnde# , #schdulEndde# , #schdulNm# , #schdulCn# , #schdulPlace# , #schdulIpcrCode# , #schdulChargerId# , #atchFileId# , #frstRegistPnttm# , #frstRegisterId# , #lastUpdtPnttm# , #lastUpdusrId# , #reptitSeCode# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnschdulinfo SET schdul_id = #schdulId# , schdul_se = #schdulSe# , schdul_dept_id = #schdulDeptId# , schdul_knd_code = #schdulKndCode# , schdul_bgnde = #schdulBgnde# , schdul_endde = #schdulEndde# , schdul_nm = #schdulNm# , schdul_cn = #schdulCn# , schdul_place = #schdulPlace# , schdul_ipcr_code = #schdulIpcrCode# , schdul_charger_id = #schdulChargerId# , atch_file_id = #atchFileId# , frst_regist_pnttm = #frstRegistPnttm# , frst_register_id = #frstRegisterId# , last_updt_pnttm = #lastUpdtPnttm# , last_updusr_id = #lastUpdusrId# , reptit_se_code = #reptitSeCode# WHERE schdul_id = #schdulId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT schdul_id , schdul_se , schdul_dept_id , schdul_knd_code , schdul_bgnde , schdul_endde , schdul_nm , schdul_cn , schdul_place , schdul_ipcr_code , schdul_charger_id , atch_file_id , frst_regist_pnttm , frst_register_id , last_updt_pnttm , last_updusr_id , reptit_se_code FROM comtnschdulinfo WHERE schdul_id = #schdulId#

SELECT schdul_id , schdul_se , schdul_dept_id , schdul_knd_code , schdul_bgnde , schdul_endde , schdul_nm , schdul_cn , schdul_place , schdul_ipcr_code , schdul_charger_id , atch_file_id , frst_regist_pnttm , frst_register_id , last_updt_pnttm , last_updusr_id , reptit_se_code FROM comtnschdulinfo WHERE 1=1
schdul_id = #searchKeyword#
schdul_se LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
ORDER BY schdul_id DESC limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM comtnschdulinfo WHERE 1=1
schdul_id = #searchKeyword#
schdul_se LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
